sequence.msg: I messaged Aida and you’re never gonna believe this but I think she’s a robot. Seriously! She’s like an actual android or intelligent AI or something. Her responses don’t make a lot of sense most of the time. I’m gonna try sending some random commands to her, maybe you should too! Also maybe Adrian knows something. He’s been here forever.
There is definitely something almost robotic about her. That's really all I got.
I always wondered how Jude was able to afford that expensive apartment of his.
I never thought between the two of us that I’d turn out to be the conspiracy theorist. Heh.
THEY’RE DOING WHAT? Oh man oh man oh man, this can’t be good. What do we do?
I’m pretty freaked-out right now, ngl. Though if we get through this, we’re gonna get some sick memes out of it.

This sounds straight out of some kind of eldritch horror roleplaying game or something. I knew there was something more to all this button pressing. How do we stop it? You got a plan? None of this makes any sense whatsoever!
This is really freaky. I totally didn’t have “employer turns out to be a cult feeding souls to an ancient evil to force the apocalypse” on my disaster bingo card.

Jude is making how much?! That is definitely suspicious. You definitely should ask him about it. No one should be making that much at this job. It does explain his yacht and penthouse though. 
 Gotta go button mash more. Keep me updated.
